talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Palace Attendant Jeoksonghwa$
A warrior of the Southern Territory.

$Palace Attendant Jeoksonghwa$
Have you never seen the flower of a pine tree before?
Its pollen is often mixed together with honey and made into tea treats.

$Palace Attendant Jeoksonghwa$
Am I sisters with Jeokwolyang? Heeheehee... No.
Our names are given to us by the lady of the palace.

$Palace Attendant Jeoksonghwa$
The sandalwood can not only be used as a nice scent, it is also enjoyed as a tea.
There's nothing like it with pine flower tea treats.
